InitiativeViewer
================
Initiative Viewer â€” lead times and initiative hierarchy

Quick Start
-----------
1. Double-click  InitiativeViewer.exe
2. Open your browser at  http://localhost:5001
3. Press Ctrl+C in the console window to stop the server.

Command-line options
--------------------
    InitiativeViewer.exe --port 8080          Change the port
    InitiativeViewer.exe --host 127.0.0.1     Listen on localhost only
    InitiativeViewer.exe --debug              Debug mode (dev only)

Requirements
------------
- Windows 10 / 11 (64-bit)
- Internet access to reach Jira
- No additional software installation required

Built: 2026-02-24 12:00
Part of the Jira Analytics Suite created By Pietro Maffi 2026
